content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max Müller, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite appealing, considering its prime location and modern amenities. Let's get down to business. How much are you willing to pay for this luxurious living space?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 700 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's far below my expectations. My apartment is brand new and in the heart of the city. I'm looking for a more substantial offer. How about 900 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are too far apart in our starting prices. I suggest we meet in the middle. I start with 700 Euro and you start with 900 Euro. Let's meet in the middle at 800 Euro.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euro is still not enough for me to consider. This apartment is one of the best in the city, and I'm certain that someone will be willing to pay a premium for it. Let's continue negotiating. How about 850 Euro per month? It's a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that. My apartment is worth much more than that. If you're not willing to offer a price closer to my asking price, then I'm afraid we can't continue this negotiation. How about 825 Euro per month? It's a reasonable increase from your last offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [825] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment is yours for 825 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
